name: The Switcher (Jam Version)
description:
• Please use fullscreen to see the buttons on the corner •

This is The Switcher, a game where you can make two objects swap properties.

I created the game for Weekly Game Jam #128, with a theme of "Camouflage". I interpreted this with character that makes two objects camouflage as each other while staying in the same place. Seeing as this was my first game jam, I would be really stoked to win. *wink*
